name: hydrologist
content:

a person who studies water on the earth, for example, where it is and how it is used: Hydrologists predict that the level of the lake will continue to drop. She is a hydrologist studying how fallen snow is distributed in mountainous regions. See
hydrology

Hydrologists and other planners are trying to determine how much water people use from the two rivers.
